summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-driven features like automatic summary generation and reading statistics. It supports multiple AI services, bilingual summaries, and content cleaning. The system includes a fallback mechanism and efficient caching. Reading statistics offer character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. Smart features recognize languages and content types, optimize performance, and ensure error handling. Installation methods include direct download and Git clone, with detailed configuration steps provided. The project aims to streamline documentation creation and enhance user experience.
